name: Cubic GhostPuzzle
description:
Playing as a cube, solving puzzels. Thats the game. But what is real, and what is not?

This is my submission for Brackeys GameJam 2022.1, themed: It is not real.
This is my first time doing a GameJam. also one of the first time trying to make a working game. I am a first year game programmer student so more will come from me. But I had some school things to finish up the first few days of the jam so I started on Wednesday and well here I am today.

The game is focused on some new mechanics I wanted to learn and just to make something functional. But as you might see, it is a lot more to do here.

Some things I would love to add:
 - A better menu
 - Some settings in the settings menu
 - Sound
 - More levels
 - Change the level Design to low poly models instead of just cubes.
 - Fix the movement and give the ghost double jump for more interesting levels.
 - And a lot more.

But thanks for testing the game and I am open for all feedback I can get! This has been fun!
